channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Brian Ruiz
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Brian Ruiz

item.title: Project 1: Predicting Boston Housing Prices
item.description: In this project, we will evaluate the performance and predictive power of a model that has been trained and tested on data collected from homes in suburbs of Boston, Massachusetts. A model trained on this data that is seen as a good fit could then be used to make certain predictions about a home’s monetary value. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Supervised Learning: Finding Donors for CharityML:
item.description: In this project, we will test out several supervised algorithms to accurately model individuals' income using data collected from the 1994 U.S. Census. We will then choose the best candidate algorithm from preliminary results and further optimize this algorithm to best model the data. Our goal with this implementation is to construct a model that accurately predicts whether an individual makes more than $50,000. Link to GitHub Repository
